properties.name: Veramin meteorite, Karand, Tehran Province, Iran
properties.description:
Veramin meteorite, Karand, Tehran Province, Iran

Type: 1

Location: Iran

Mesosiderite-B2 (stony iron) Fall, 18 Apr 1880; 54 kg The fall of the Veramin mesosiderite was accompanied by ten or so very loud explosions, smoke, and the almost immediate recovery of a pitted 54 kg stone. The stone soon came into the possession...

properties.name: Naragh meteorite, Naragh (Naraq; Narāq; Narāk), Delijan County, Markazi Province, Iran
properties.description:
Naragh meteorite, Naragh (Naraq; Narāq; Narāk), Delijan County, Markazi Province, Iran

Type: 1

Location: Iran

Ordinary chondrite, H6. Fallen at 09:20 a. m. local time on August 18, 1974, on the flat roof of a secondary school at Naragh (51°30'E, 33°45'N [note: apparently wrong coordinates - they place the fall about 90 km away from Naragh, and were therefor...

properties.description:
Famenin meteorite, Famenin County, Hamadan Province, Iran

Type: 1

Location: Iran

Ordinary chondrite, unequilibrated (H/L3) Fell, 27 June 2015; 630 g During the early morning a loud sound on the roof led to the discovery of several small fragments of a small stone on the roof and yard. The meteorite is an unequilibrated chondrit...
